name: Highlight Component
description: Visually highlight a component with a colored border and optional label for debugging purposes. The highlight appears temporarily to help identify components in the UI. Useful for debugging component placement, visibility, and layout issues.

componentId.description: The ID of the component to highlight (e.g., 'table-1', 'chart-results'). This is the module ID assigned when the component was rendered.

color.description: Border color for the highlight. Can be a CSS color name (red, blue), hex code (#ff0000), or RGB value. Default: 'red'

duration.description: How long to show the highlight in milliseconds. Set to 0 for permanent highlight that must be manually cleared. Default: 3000 (3 seconds)

label.description: Optional text label to display with the highlight. Appears in top-left corner of component.
